    Data Manipulations with CFLAnnualSavingsBelief 
    file # command
    Analysis/Code/LightbulbsDataPrep.do: 283 [+] gen CFLAnnualSavingsBelief = BeliefAmount1 if (BeliefQType=="B"|BeliefQType=="D")&BeliefTime1=="year" 
    • ** Relative Costs
* Beliefs
	* Here we are assuming that all people know that CFLs use less energy.
	* The justification for assuming this is that BeliefMoreLess is "less" about 99% of the time.
gen CFLAnnualSavingsBelief = BeliefAmount1 if (BeliefQType=="B"|BeliefQType=="D")&BeliefTime1=="year"
    All properties 
    key content
    command gen
    if (BeliefQType=="B"|BeliefQType=="D")&BeliefTime1=="year"
    indent 0
    parameters CFLAnnualSavingsBelief = BeliefAmount1


    : 284 [+] replace CFLAnnualSavingsBelief = BeliefAmount1*12 if (BeliefQType=="B"|BeliefQType=="D")&BeliefTime1=="month" 
    • replace CFLAnnualSavingsBelief = BeliefAmount1*12 if (BeliefQType=="B"|BeliefQType=="D")&BeliefTime1=="month"
    All properties 
    key content
    command replace
    if (BeliefQType=="B"|BeliefQType=="D")&BeliefTime1=="month"

    : 285 [+] replace CFLAnnualSavingsBelief = BeliefAmount1*365 if (BeliefQType=="B"|BeliefQType=="D")&BeliefTime1=="day" 
    • replace CFLAnnualSavingsBelief = BeliefAmount1*365 if (BeliefQType=="B"|BeliefQType=="D")&BeliefTime1=="day"
    All properties 
    key content
    command replace
    if (BeliefQType=="B"|BeliefQType=="D")&BeliefTime1=="day"
    indent 0
    parameters CFLAnnualSavingsBelief = BeliefAmount1*365


    : 295 [+] replace CFLAnnualSavingsBelief = IncAnnCostBelief-CFLAnnCostBelief if (BeliefQType=="A"|BeliefQType=="C") 
    • * Add annual savings beliefs for the absolute cost groups
replace CFLAnnualSavingsBelief = IncAnnCostBelief-CFLAnnCostBelief if (BeliefQType=="A"|BeliefQType=="C")
    All properties 
    key content
    command replace
    if (BeliefQType=="A"|BeliefQType=="C")
    indent 0
    parameters CFLAnnualSavingsBelief = IncAnnCostBelief-CFLAnnCostBelief


    : 299 [+] gen phi = CFLAnnualSavingsBelief/CFLAnnualSavingsTrue if BeliefQType !="" 
    • ** Generate the Allcott (2012) phi: The ratio of perceived to true savings.
gen phi = CFLAnnualSavingsBelief/CFLAnnualSavingsTrue if BeliefQType !=""
    All properties 
    key content
    command gen
    if BeliefQType !=""
    indent 0
    parameters phi = CFLAnnualSavingsBelief/CFLAnnualSavingsTrue


    : 310 [+] gen CFLAnnualSavingsBelief_Bulb = CFLAnnualSavingsBelief if BeliefQType =="A"|BeliefQType=="B" 
    • ** Relative Cost Group
	*Per Bulb Group
gen CFLAnnualSavingsBelief_Bulb = CFLAnnualSavingsBelief if BeliefQType =="A"|BeliefQType=="B"
    All properties 
    key content
    command gen
    if BeliefQType =="A"|BeliefQType=="B"
    indent 0
    parameters CFLAnnualSavingsBelief_Bulb = CFLAnnualSavingsBelief


    : 312 [+] replace CFLAnnualSavingsBelief_Bulb = CFLAnnualSavingsBelief/NumberofBulbs if BeliefQType =="C"|BeliefQType=="D" 
    • 	*Package Group
replace CFLAnnualSavingsBelief_Bulb = CFLAnnualSavingsBelief/NumberofBulbs if BeliefQType =="C"|BeliefQType=="D"
    All properties 
    key content
    command replace
    if BeliefQType =="C"|BeliefQType=="D"
    indent 0
    parameters CFLAnnualSavingsBelief_Bulb = CFLAnnualSavingsBelief/NumberofBulbs
